title: @RiotJynx Cosplay
body: You had an AMAZING Vi cosplay at pax east and its really hard to find photos of so I am hoping you will share with the community.  Also I talked to you on sunday night and you are extremely awesome and cool so keep that up too ;)

replies.body: Thank you Bort! I'll be sharing some event photos on the page that Astropanda linked below. I appreciate you chatting with me on Sunday, and hope you had an awesome time at PAX! ^_^
Wow holy hell thats you? Had no idea there where such beautiful women in riot except for Nika (who left...). Dat PentaKill SOna... op

Here is her facebook page thingy. She quite an amazing artist as well use to have a web comic.

https://www.facebook.com/JynxedArt
